name: Plug Away!
description:
Plug Away! is a game I made in a few days as my submission for the Black and White Jam #8. The goal of the jam was to create a game using only black and white. There was also a given them of "Loop."

Controls: Keyboard:
  • Left arrow key rotates the player counter-clockwise.
  • Right arrow key rotates the player clockwise.
  • Spacebar to speed up.
  • Escape key to pause.
Controller:
  • Push the left analog stick left to rotate the player counter-clockwise.
  • Push the left analog stick right to rotate the player clockwise.
  • X (DualShock) / A (Xbox) / B (Nintendo) button to speed up.
  • Start button to pause.
